input[type="text"]

PREVIEW

CODE

<input type="text" class="input_text small" title="아이디를 입력해주세요" />
<input type="text" class="input_text medium" title="아이디를 입력해주세요" />

input[type="password"]

PREVIEW

CODE

<input type="password" class="input_password small" title="비밀번호를 입력해주세요" />
<input type="password" class="input_password medium" title="비밀번호를 입력해주세요" />

input[type="search"]

PREVIEW

CODE

<input type="text" class="input_search small" title="검색어 입력" />

input[type="file"]

PREVIEW

CODE

< type="file" class="input_file small" title="파일 업로드" />
Individual

input[type="radio"]

PREVIEW

CODE

<label for=""><input type="radio" class="radio" id="" name="" title="옵션1 선택" checked="checked" /> 옵션1</label>
<label for=""><input type="radio" class="radio" id="" name="" title="옵션2 선택" /> 옵션2</label>

input[type="checkbox"]

PREVIEW

CODE

<label for=""><input type="checkbox" class="checkbox" id="" title="항목 선택" checked="checked" /> 항목</label>

selectbox

PREVIEW

CODE

<select class="select">
<option>옵션1</option>
</select>

textarea - placeholder 기능 미정

PREVIEW

CODE

<textarea class="textarea" id="" name="" cols="30" rows="10" placeholder="작성해 주세요."></textarea>
